Intelli Jest wynikiem prawdziwej pasji d: Intelli is the result of a true passion for automation. The project launched by a team of real enthusiasts and experienced specialists. We focus on providing the best solutions in the field of industrial and home automation.
Zajmujemy się całym procesem produkcyjny: We carry out the entire process related to the delivery of a fully functional automation system that supports the work of warehouses, production plants and distribution centers.
Dostarczanie klientom najwyższych standa: Providing customers the highest quality standards in the industry, with innovative solutions, based on the professionalism and experience of our team.
W związku z ciągłym rozwojem, poszukujem: Due to continuous development, we are looking for new members of our team
Uważasz, że mógłbyś wnieść swoją wartość: Do you think you could bring value to our company?
Kompleksowa realizacja systemów automaty: Complex implementation of industrial automation systems. Design, prefabrication of control cabinets, assembly and commissioning. We specialize in both heavy and light transport systems.
Nasi specjaliści pomogą Państwu w komple: Our specialists will help you in the comprehensive process of analyzing design assumptions and executive offers. In addition, we will perform a functional audit and security validation for you by a specialist with a CMSE® certificate.
Doradztwo w zakresie określenia potrzeb: Advice on determining the client's needs in terms of the possibility of optimizing processes by selecting the appropriate type of automatic system
Posiadamy odpowiednie kompetencje oraz z: We have the appropriate competences and resources to carry out a comprehensive system design process.
Na podstawie schematów elektrycznych prz: On the basis of electrical diagrams, we carry out complex prefabrication and delivery of control cabinets
Instalacja tras kablowych, przez montaż: Installation of cable routes, through the assembly and connection of control cabinets, CCTV monitoring, network systems to electrical measurements.
Bazując na założeniach projektowych oraz: Based on the functional description and desing assumptions, we will preprare a comprehensive PLC program of controlling the process control and prepare an intuitive HMI panel apllication.
Nasi doświadczeni programiści zajmą się: Our experienced programmers will integrate and commission the entire system.
Po uruchomieniu systemu zadbamy o to, ab: Once the system is up and running, we will make sure that the staff is prepared to work with the system and know what activities to perform periodically to ensure trouble-free operation.
Nasz dział serwisowy zadba o wsparcie ob: Our service department will take care of service support in the event of such a need. We offer service in Polish, English, German and French.
Instalacja, uruchomienie i serwis komple: Installation, commissioning and service of complex automation solutions for residential, office, public use and hotel buildings.
Integracja urządzeń IOT(systemy audio, s: Integration of IOT devices(audio systems, smart home appliances, cleaning robots, garden robots, humidifiers, etc.) with other building automation systems.
Sterowanie temperaturą i wentylacją w po: Control room temperature and ventilation for your own comfort and savings.
Systemy chroniące przed włamaniem i niea: Protection against burglary and unauthorized access. Simulation of presence in the building. Monitor the level of air quality in the room.
Integracja monitoringu z aplikacją zarzą: Integration of CCTV cameras with building management application. Automation of entrance gates using license plate recognition.
Kontrola zużytych mediów, optymalizacja: Control of consumed utilities, optimizing consumption with automation using occupancy sensors and schedules.
Automatyzacja otwierania i zamykania rol: Automatic opening and closing of blinds using schedules and weather station.
Automatyzacja oświetlenia za pomocą sens: Automatyzacja oświetlenia za pomocą sensorów ruchu, natężenia światła i harmonogramów. Programowanie scen nastrojowych.
Wygodne sterowanie i monitorowanie funkc: Reliable controls and monitoring for your building automation system with user friendly application on your device for worldwide access.
